command.name: delete
command.confirmation: Are you sure you want to perform this operation?

command.name: create
command.argGroup:
<arg type="array" var="$resource.properties.attributes" options="attributes" hide="True" group="Properties">

<arg type="array" var="$resource.properties.roles" options="roles" hide="True" group="Properties">
<arg type="array<@Attributes_create>" var="$resource.properties.roles[].attributes" options="attributes">
<arg type="array" var="$resource.properties.roles[].permissions" options="permissions">
